00024 /*************************************************************************************
00025 
00026 handlers.h is for the ppibiclusters.cpp. The main contribuiton of this
00027 header is to functionate the main program. You can just call handlers for
00028 each iterative modules.
00029 
00030 Created
00031 
00032 18 October 2009, by Melih
00033 
00034 Modified
00035 
00036 18 October 2009, by Melih
00037   Four main functions introduced, extracted from main executable file
00038 22 October 2009, by Melih
00039   To obtain the results from our xcoordinate assignment using new identiftyXPositions
00040   functions from graphUnion.h. We addedd input parameter "ourMethodFlag" to the
00041   mainAlgHandlingForEachSubgraph function. RUN_SELF call is also changed since
00042   the call of our method is inside RUN_SELF.
00043 23 October 2009, by Melih
00044   interactionHandling function has a property to get different ppi networks
00045   from main menu.
00046 30 October 2009, by Melih
00047   mainGraphHandling function is created. It mainly does the layout of biclusters graphs,
00048   and window layout for clicking in order to see peripheral graphs.
00049 08 December 2009 by Melih
00050  "interpretBiclusters.h" is added to this header. The results of other algorithms
00051  are interpreted with the functions of this header and then written to a conventional
00052  format of bicluster output. Then each result is interpreted using 
00053  getBiclustersFromFile2 function.
00054 15 December 2009 by Melih
00055  New Layout Force Directed Function is added
00056 *************************************************************************************/
00057

00086 void biclusterHandling( matrix &INPUT, list<list<GENES> > &biclusters, list<leda::matrix> &matrixBiclusters, list<double> &H_values, double &Hmax, int minBicSize, int maxBicSize, int biclustering, int dimension1, int dimension2  ){
00087         list_item it;
00088         leda::matrix inverseINPUT = INPUT.trans();
00089         if( biclustering == 1 ){
00090                 getBiclustersFromFile( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00091                 analyseGenes( "geneResult", biclusters.size(), dimension1, dimension2  );
00092         }
00093         if( biclustering == 2 ){
00094                 getBiclustersFromFile2( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, "ISA", dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00095                 analyseGenes2( "geneResult", biclusters.size(), "ISA", dimension1, dimension2  );
00096         }
00097         if( biclustering == 3 ){
00098                 getBiclustersFromFile2( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, "CC", dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00099                 analyseGenes2( "geneResult", biclusters.size(), "CC", dimension1, dimension2  );
00100         }
00101         if( biclustering == 4 ){
00102                 getBiclustersFromFile2( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, "OPSM", dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00103                 analyseGenes2( "geneResult", biclusters.size(), "OPSM" , dimension1, dimension2 );
00104         }
00105         if( biclustering == 5 ){
00106                 getBiclustersFromFile2( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, "SAMBA", dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00107                 analyseGenes2( "geneResult", biclusters.size(), "SAMBA" , dimension1, dimension2 );
00108         }
00109         if( biclustering == 6 ){
00110                 getBiclustersFromFile5( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, "MSBE", 1, dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00111                 analyseGenes2( "geneResult", biclusters.size(), "MSBE" , dimension1, dimension2 );
00112         }
00113 //      if( biclustering == 7 )
00114 //              getBiclustersFromFile6( inverseINPUT, 1, minBicSize , maxBicSize, matrixBiclusters, biclusters, "LAS", dimension1, dimension2 ); 
00115         
00116         
00117         matrix newI2;
00118         int k = 1;
00119         
00120         forall_items( it , matrixBiclusters ){
00121                 char filename2[1024] = "";
00122                 int count_i = 0;
00123                 newI2 = matrixBiclusters[ it ];
00124                 double rs_value;
00125                 double bagMean = 0;
00126                 for( int bag1_int = 0; bag1_int <  newI2.dim1(); bag1_int++ ){
00127                         for( int bag2_int = 0; bag2_int <  newI2.dim2(); bag2_int++ ){
00128                             bagMean += newI2( bag1_int, bag2_int );
00129                         }
00130                 }
00131                 bagMean = bagMean / (double)( newI2.dim1() * newI2.dim2() );
00132                 double rowMean = 0;
00133                 double colMean = 0;
00134                 double residueScore = 0;
00135                 double residueScoreWhole = 0;
00136                 /*cout << endl;
00137                 for( int bag1_int = i_int; bag1_int < i_int + bagDim1_int; bag1_int++ ){
00138                         for( int bag2_int = j_int; bag2_int < j_int + bagDim2_int; bag2_int++ ){
00139                                 cout << extract_mx( bag1_int, bag2_int ) << " ";
00140                         }
00141                         cout << endl;
00142                 }*/
00143                 /*****************************************************************************/
00144                 for( int bag1_int = 0; bag1_int <  newI2.dim1(); bag1_int++ ){
00145                         for( int bag2_int = 0; bag2_int <  newI2.dim2(); bag2_int++ ){
00146                             /* For each value inside the sub matrix calculate row mean, col mean, and bicluster mean*/
00147                             /* Calculate row mean */
00148                             for( int bag2_int2 = 0; bag2_int2 < newI2.dim2(); bag2_int2++ ){
00149                                     rowMean += newI2( bag1_int, bag2_int2 );
00150                             }
00151                             rowMean = rowMean / newI2.dim2();
00152                             /* Calculate col mean */
00153                             for( int bag1_int2 = 0; bag1_int2 < newI2.dim1(); bag1_int2++ ){
00154                                     colMean += newI2( bag1_int2, bag2_int );
00155                             }
00156                             colMean = colMean / newI2.dim1();
00157                             residueScore += (double)newI2( bag1_int, bag2_int ) + - rowMean - colMean + bagMean;
00158                             residueScore *= residueScore;
00159                             residueScoreWhole += residueScore;
00160 
00161                 
00162                             residueScore = 0;
00163                             colMean = 0;
00164                             rowMean = 0;
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167                 /*****************************************************************************/
00168                 double rs_Value = residueScoreWhole / (double)( newI2.dim1() * newI2.dim2() ) ;
00169                 H_values.append( rs_Value );
00170 //              cout << rs_Value << endl;
00171                 Hmax = rs_Value;
00172         }
00173 }

00184 void interactionHandling( node_array<GENENAMES> &temp, array<GENENAMES> &GenesNode, GRAPH<int,int> &INTERACTIONS, GRAPH<int,int> &TEMPINT, leda::string &ppiFile ){
00185 
00186         list_item it;
00187         FILE *interactionsPtr;
00188         char ppiFileToOpen[96];
00189 
00190 //      cout << ppiFile << endl;
00191 
00192         sprintf( ppiFileToOpen, "%s","sources/ppi_sources/");
00193         for( int s_i = 0; s_i != ppiFile.length(); s_i++ ){
00194 //              cout << ppiFileToOpen << endl;
00195                 sprintf( ppiFileToOpen, "%s%c", ppiFileToOpen, ppiFile[ s_i ] );
00196         }
00197 
00198 //      cout <<  "Bitti " << endl << ppiFileToOpen << endl;
00199         //For Sample Data
00200         //interactionsPtr = fopen( "DenemeYeastProteinInteractions.txt", "r" );
00201         //For Real Data
00202         interactionsPtr = fopen( ppiFileToOpen, "r" );          
00203         node n,sourceTemp,targetTemp;
00204         edge e;
00205         char sourceGene[1024], targetGene[1024], relation[1024];
00206         double value;
00207         list<GENENAMES> entered;
00208         int numberOfReleations = 0;
00209         int nodeAdded = 0;
00210         while( !feof( interactionsPtr ) ){
00211                 if( numberOfReleations % 1000 == 999 )
00212                         cout << "* " << INTERACTIONS.number_of_edges() << " " << INTERACTIONS.number_of_nodes() << endl;
00213 
00214                 fscanf( interactionsPtr, "%s%s%lf", sourceGene, targetGene, &value );
00215                 
00216                 // FOR SOURCE GENES
00217                 int flag = 0;
00218                 if( numberOfReleations > 0 ){
00219                         forall_items( it, entered ){
00220                                 if( strcmp( entered[ it ].GENE, sourceGene ) == 0 ){
00221                                         flag = 1;
00222                                 }
00223                         }
00224                         if( flag == 1 ){
00225                                 forall_nodes( n, INTERACTIONS ){
00226                                         if( strcmp( GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ n ]].GENE , sourceGene ) == 0 ){
00227                                                 sourceTemp = n;
00228                                                 break;
00229                                         }
00230                                 }
00231                         }
00232                         else{
00233                                 sourceTemp = INTERACTIONS.new_node();
00234                                 INTERACTIONS[ sourceTemp ] = nodeAdded;
00235                                 nodeAdded++;
00236                                 GenesNode.resize( nodeAdded );
00237                                 sprintf( GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ sourceTemp ] ].GENE, "%s",sourceGene );
00238                                 GENENAMES tempx;
00239                                 sprintf( tempx.GENE, "%s", sourceGene );
00240                                 entered.append( tempx );
00241                         }
00242                 }
00243                 else{
00244                                 sourceTemp = INTERACTIONS.new_node();
00245                                 INTERACTIONS[ sourceTemp ] = nodeAdded;
00246                                 nodeAdded++;
00247                                 GenesNode.resize( nodeAdded );
00248                                 sprintf( GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ sourceTemp ] ].GENE, "%s",sourceGene );
00249                                 GENENAMES tempx;
00250                                 sprintf( tempx.GENE, "%s", sourceGene );
00251                                 entered.append( tempx );
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 // FOR TARGET GENES
00255                 flag = 0;
00256                 forall_items( it, entered ){
00257                         if( strcmp( entered[ it ].GENE , targetGene ) == 0 ){
00258                                 flag = 1;
00259                         }
00260                 }
00261                 if( flag == 1 ){
00262                         forall_nodes( n, INTERACTIONS ){
00263                                 if( strcmp( GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ n ] ].GENE, targetGene ) == 0 ){
00264                                         targetTemp = n;
00265                                         break;
00266                                 }
00267                         }
00268                 }
00269                 else{
00270                         targetTemp = INTERACTIONS.new_node();
00271                         INTERACTIONS[ targetTemp ] = nodeAdded;
00272                         nodeAdded++;
00273                         GenesNode.resize( nodeAdded );
00274                         sprintf( GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ targetTemp ] ].GENE, "%s", targetGene );
00275                         GENENAMES tempx;
00276                         sprintf( tempx.GENE, "%s", targetGene );
00277                         entered.append( tempx );
00278                 }
00279                 e = INTERACTIONS.new_edge( sourceTemp, targetTemp );
00280                 INTERACTIONS[ e ] = fabs(log( value * 10000.0 ));
00281                 numberOfReleations++;
00282                 /*cout << endl;*/                       
00283         }
00284         cout << endl;
00285 //      forall_edges( e, INTERACTIONS )
00286 //              cout << GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ INTERACTIONS.source( e ) ] ].GENE << " " << GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ INTERACTIONS.target( e )] ].GENE << endl;
00287 //      
00288         fclose( interactionsPtr );
00289 }

00304 void inpGraphProdHandling( GRAPH<int,int> &G, array<GRAPH<int,int> > &listOfGraphs, char abbv[],  array<char> &Categories, node_array<GENENAMES> &temp, array<GENENAMES> &GenesNode, GRAPH<int,int> &INTERACTIONS, GRAPH<int,int> &TEMPINT, list<list<GENES> > &biclusters ){
00305         FILE *categoryOfGenes;
00306         node n,m1,m2;
00307         categoryOfGenes = fopen( "sources/ppi_sources/yeastgenefunctions.txt", "r" );
00308         int geneCount = 0;
00309         while( !feof( categoryOfGenes ) ){
00310             fscanf( categoryOfGenes, "%s%s", g[ geneCount ].gene, g[ geneCount ].geneType );
00311             forall_nodes( n, INTERACTIONS ){
00312                 if( strcmp( GenesNode[ INTERACTIONS[ n ] ].GENE , g[ geneCount ].gene) == 0 ){
00313                     for( int i = 0; i < 13; i++ ){
00314                         if( g[ geneCount ].geneType[ 0 ] == abbv[ i ] ){
00315                             Categories[ INTERACTIONS[n] ] = abbv[ i ];                              
00316                         }
00317                     }
00318                 }
00319             }
00320             //cout << geneCount << " ";
00321             geneCount++;
00322         }
00323         /*forall_nodes( n, INTERACTIONS ){
00324               cout << Categories[ INTERACTIONS[n] ] << " ";
00325         }*/
00326         fclose( categoryOfGenes );
00327 
00328         cout << endl << " * Gene File is loaded from ppi_sources" << endl;
00329         
00330         cout << endl << " * Loading biclusters to form their ppi graphs " << endl;
00331                     TEMPINT = INTERACTIONS;
00332         array<int> nodePar( INTERACTIONS.number_of_nodes()+1 );
00333         int nPar = 0;
00334         forall_nodes( n, INTERACTIONS ){
00335                 nodePar[ nPar ] = INTERACTIONS[ n ];
00336                 nPar++;
00337         }
00338         for( int i = 0; i < biclusters.size(); i++ ){
00339                 listOfGraphs[ i ] = INTERACTIONS;
00340                 nPar = 0;
00341                 forall_nodes( n,listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00342                         listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] = nodePar[ nPar ];
00343                         nPar++;
00344                 }
00345         }
00346 
00347         list<edge> list_E;
00348         list_item it_b1 = biclusters.first_item(),it_b2;
00349         for( int i = 0; i < biclusters.size(); i++ ){
00350                 G = listOfGraphs[ i ];                                                                 
00351                 list<GENES> tmp1 = biclusters[ it_b1 ];
00352                 
00353                 cout << " GRAPH " << i << " WITH SIZE " << tmp1.size() << " || ";
00354                 forall_nodes( m1, G ){
00355                         if( tmp1.size() == 0 ){
00356                                 G.clear();                                      
00357                                 break;
00358                         }
00359                         bool isEnter = false;
00360                         forall_items( it_b2, tmp1 ){
00361                                 if( strcmp( GenesNode[  G[ m1 ] ].GENE, tmp1[ it_b2 ].GENE ) == 0 ){
00362                                         isEnter = true;
00363                                         break;
00364                                 }
00365                         }
00366                         if( isEnter == false ){
00367                                 G.del_node( m1 );
00368                         }
00369                 }
00370                 cout << " GRAPH IS PRODUCED ||";
00371                 forall_nodes( m1, G ){
00372                     list<edge> inedges = G.in_edges( m1 );
00373                     list<edge> outedges = G.out_edges( m1 );
00374                     if( (inedges.size() + outedges.size() ) == 0 )
00375                         G.del_node( m1 );
00376                 }
00377                 listOfGraphs[ i ] = G;
00378                 it_b1 = biclusters.succ( it_b1 );
00379                 cout << " GRAPH IS CLEANED " << endl;
00380         }
00381 }

00408 void mainAlgHandlingForEachSubgraph( node_array<point> &pos, 
00409                                      edge_array<list<point> > &bends, 
00410                                      array<list<node> > &layers,
00411                                      list<GRAPH<int,int> > &GraphList, 
00412                                      list<GRAPH<leda::string,int> > &GraphList_S,
00413                                      node_array<double> &Xpos,
00414                                      node_array<double> &Ypos,
00415                                      list<node_array<point> > &POS,
00416                                      list<edge_array<list<point> > > &BENDS,
00417                                      list<array<list<node> > > &LAYERS,
00418                                      GRAPH<leda::string,int> &PROJECT,
00419                                      array<GENENAMES> &GenesNode,
00420                                      array<GRAPH<int,int> > &listOfGraphs,
00421                                      list<list<Strings> > &namesForEachGraph,
00422                                      list<list<GENES> > &biclusters,
00423                                      int &width,
00424                                      int algorithmFlag,
00425                                      int space,
00426                                      bool xCoordFlag,
00427                                      int increment,
00428                                      bool ledaPostFlag
00429                                   ){
00430         node projectNode,projectNode2,m,m1,m2,zzz,n1,n2,n;
00431         edge e1,e2,e;
00432         list_item it1,it;
00433         GRAPH<int,int> H;
00434         int node_number;
00435         int edge_number;
00436         int ncount=0,ecount=0;
00437         int fileIndex = 0;
00438         char filename[ 1024 ];
00439         FILE *wptr2,*wptr3;
00440         wptr3 = fopen( "sources/graph_sources/graph_infos.txt", "w" );
00441         for(int i = 0; i < biclusters.size(); i++ ){    
00442                 if( listOfGraphs[ i ].empty() != true ){
00443                     pos.init( listOfGraphs[ i ] );
00444                     bends.init( listOfGraphs[ i ] );   
00445                     array<int> nodePar( listOfGraphs[ i ].number_of_nodes()+1 );
00446                     int nPar = 0;
00447                     forall_nodes( n, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00448                           nodePar[ nPar ] = listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ];
00449 //                        cout << nodePar[ nPar ] << " - " << listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] << endl;
00450                           nPar++;
00451                     }
00452                     H = RUN_SELF( listOfGraphs[ i ], layers, width, Xpos, Ypos, i + 1, pos, bends, algorithmFlag, space, xCoordFlag, increment, ledaPostFlag );
00453                     nPar = 0;
00454                     forall_nodes( n, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00455                           listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] = nodePar[ nPar ];
00456 //                        cout << nodePar[ nPar ] << " - " << listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] << endl;
00457                           nPar++;
00458                     }  
00459 
00460                                 GraphList.append( listOfGraphs[ i ] );
00461                                 sprintf( filename , "sources/graph_sources/Graph%d.txt" , i+1 );
00462                                 ofstream GRAPHS( filename , ios::in | ios::trunc );
00463                             
00464                             
00465                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\n", "_________________________________" );
00466                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\t%s\n", "File Name      :", filename ); 
00467                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\t%d\n", "Number of Graph:", i );
00468                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\n", "_________________________________" );
00469                                 projectNode = PROJECT.new_node();
00470                                 char nameS[ 200 ][ 16 ];
00471                                 list<Strings> nameGraph;
00472                             
00473                                 int nn = 0;
00474                                 node_array<int> INDEX( listOfGraphs[ i ], 0 );
00475                                 forall_nodes( n, listOfGraphs[ i ]){
00476                                         ncount = 0;
00477                                         INDEX[ n ] = nn;
00478                                         STRINGS temp_S;
00479                                         strcpy( temp_S.name, GenesNode[ listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] ].GENE);
00480 //                                      cout << GenesNode[ listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] ].GENE << endl;
00481                                         nameGraph.append( temp_S  );
00482                                         nn++;   
00483                                 }
00484                                 /*forall_items( it, nameGraph )
00485                                         printf( "%s\n", (char*)nameGraph[ it ].name );*/
00486                                 namesForEachGraph.append(nameGraph);
00487 
00488                                 sprintf( filename , "sources/graph_sources/Relation%d.txt" , i+1 );
00489                                 wptr2 = fopen( filename, "w" );
00490                                 forall_edges( e, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00491                                         node source = listOfGraphs[ i ].source( e );
00492                                         node target = listOfGraphs[ i ].target( e );
00493                                         fprintf( wptr2, "%s\t=>\t%s\t|\t|\n", nameS[ INDEX[ source ] ], nameS[ INDEX[target] ] );
00494                                 }
00495 
00496                                 fclose( wptr2 );
00497 
00498 
00499                                 leda::string m = "";
00500                                 listOfGraphs[ i ].write( GRAPHS );
00501                                 GRAPHS.close();
00502 
00503                                 /************************************************/
00504                                 /*    Copy Graph as leda::string type Graph     */
00505                                 /************************************************/
00506                               GRAPH<leda::string,int> HAsString;                
00507                               HAsString.clear();
00508                               leda::string temp;
00509                               int count = 0;
00510                               forall_nodes( n, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00511                                       zzz = HAsString.new_node();
00512                                       for( ; count < 16; count++ );
00513                                               temp.insert( count, nameS[ INDEX[ n ] ][ count ] );
00514                                       HAsString[ zzz ] = temp;
00515                               }
00516                               node_array<int> INDEX_S( HAsString, 0 );
00517                               count = 0;
00518                               forall_nodes( n, HAsString ){
00519                                       INDEX_S[ n ] = count;
00520                                       count++;
00521                               }
00522                               forall_edges( e, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00523                                       int a = INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].source( e ) ];
00524                                       int b = INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].target( e ) ];
00525 
00526                                       forall_nodes( m1, HAsString ){
00527                                               if( INDEX_S[ m1 ] == a )
00528                                                       break;
00529                                       }
00530                                       forall_nodes( m2, HAsString ){
00531                                               if( INDEX_S[ m2 ] == b )
00532                                                       break;
00533                                       }
00534                                       //cout << m1 << " " << a << " - " << m2 << b << endl; 
00535                                       HAsString.new_edge( m1, m2, 1 );
00536                               }
00537 
00538                               node_array<point> pos_S(HAsString);
00539                               edge_array<list<point> > bends_S(HAsString);
00540                               array <list<node> > layer_S( layers.size());
00541                               /*forall_nodes( n1, HAsString ){
00542                                   cout << endl<< INDEX_S[ n1 ];
00543                               }
00544                               forall_nodes( n2, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00545                                   cout << endl<< INDEX[ n2 ];
00546                               }*/
00547                               forall_nodes( n1, HAsString ){
00548                                   forall_nodes( n2, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00549                                       //cout << endl<< INDEX_S[ n1 ] << "  " << INDEX[ n2 ]<<endl;
00550                                       if( INDEX_S[ n1 ] == INDEX[ n2 ] ){
00551                                           //cout << endl << pos_S[ n1 ] << "  " << pos[ n2 ] << endl;        
00552                                           pos_S[ n1 ] = pos[ n2 ];
00553                                       }
00554                                   }
00555                               }
00556                               forall_edges( e1, HAsString ){
00557                                   forall_edges( e2, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00558                                       if( INDEX_S[ HAsString.source( e1 ) ] == INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].source( e2 ) ] &&
00559                                             INDEX_S[ HAsString.target( e1 ) ] == INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].target( e2 )  ] )
00560                                             bends_S[ e1 ] = bends[ e2 ];
00561                                   }
00562                               }
00563                               int j;
00564                               for( j = 0; j < layers.size(); j++ ){
00565                                   list<node> layerTemp = layers[ j ];
00566                                   forall_items( it, layerTemp ){
00567                                       forall_nodes( n1, HAsString ){
00568                                           if( INDEX_S[ n1 ] == INDEX[ layerTemp[ it ] ] ){
00569                                             layer_S[ j ].push_back( n1 );
00570                                           }
00571                                       }
00572                                   }
00573                               }
00574                               for( j = 0; j < layer_S.size(); j++ ){
00575                                   list<node> layerTemp = layer_S[ j ];
00576 //                                forall_items( it, layerTemp ){
00577 //                                      cout << INDEX_S[ layerTemp[ it ] ] << " ";
00578 //                                }
00579                               }
00580                               cout << endl;
00581                               for( j = 0; j < layers.size(); j++ ){
00582                                   list<node> layerTemp = layers[ j ];
00583 //                                forall_items( it, layerTemp ){
00584 //                                      cout << INDEX[ layerTemp[ it ] ] << " ";
00585 //                                }
00586                               }
00587 
00588 
00589                               POS.push_back( pos_S );
00590                               BENDS.push_back( bends_S );
00591                               LAYERS.push_back( layer_S );
00592                               GraphList_S.append( HAsString );
00593                               //cout << " Size 1 : " << HAsString.number_of_nodes() << " Size 2 : " << listOfGraphs[ i ].number_of_nodes() << " Size 3 : " << nameGraph.size() << endl;
00594                               HAsString.clear();
00595                 }
00596                             /************************************************/
00597                             /* End of Copy Graph as leda::string type Graph */
00598                             /************************************************/                  
00599         }
00600         fclose( wptr3 );
00601 }
00602 
00625 void mainAlgHandlingForEachSubgraph2( node_array<point> &pos, 
00626                                      edge_array<list<point> > &bends, 
00627                                      array<list<node> > &layers,
00628                                      list<GRAPH<int,int> > &GraphList, 
00629                                      list<GRAPH<leda::string,int> > &GraphList_S,
00630                                      node_array<double> &Xpos,
00631                                      node_array<double> &Ypos,
00632                                      list<node_array<point> > &POS,
00633                                      list<edge_array<list<point> > > &BENDS,
00634                                      list<array<list<node> > > &LAYERS,
00635                                      GRAPH<leda::string,int> &PROJECT,
00636                                      array<GENENAMES> &GenesNode,
00637                                      array<GRAPH<int,int> > &listOfGraphs,
00638                                      list<list<Strings> > &namesForEachGraph,
00639                                      list<list<GENES> > &biclusters,
00640                                      int &width,
00641                                      int algorithmFlag,
00642                                      int space,
00643                                      bool xCoordFlag,
00644                                      int increment,
00645                                      bool ledaPostFlag
00646                                   ){
00647         node projectNode,projectNode2,m,m1,m2,zzz,n1,n2,n;
00648         edge e1,e2,e;
00649         list_item it1,it;
00650         GRAPH<int,int> H;
00651         int node_number;
00652         int edge_number;
00653         int ncount=0,ecount=0;
00654         int fileIndex = 0;
00655         char filename[ 1024 ];
00656         FILE *wptr2,*wptr3;
00657         wptr3 = fopen( "sources/graph_sources/graph_infos.txt", "w" );
00658         for(int i = 0; i < biclusters.size(); i++ ){    
00659                 if( listOfGraphs[ i ].empty() != true ){
00660                     pos.init( listOfGraphs[ i ] );
00661                     bends.init( listOfGraphs[ i ] );   
00662                     H = RUN_FFD( listOfGraphs[ i ], layers, width, Xpos, Ypos, i + 1, pos, bends, algorithmFlag, space, xCoordFlag, increment, ledaPostFlag );
00663                     
00664                   
00665                                 GraphList.append( listOfGraphs[ i ] );
00666                                 sprintf( filename , "sources/graph_sources/Graph%d.txt" , i+1 );
00667                                 ofstream GRAPHS( filename , ios::in | ios::trunc );
00668                             
00669                             
00670                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\n", "_________________________________" );
00671                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\t%s\n", "File Name      :", filename ); 
00672                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\t%d\n", "Number of Graph:", i );
00673                                 fprintf( wptr3, "%s\n", "_________________________________" );
00674                                 projectNode = PROJECT.new_node();
00675                                 char nameS[ 200 ][ 16 ];
00676                                 list<Strings> nameGraph;
00677                             
00678                                 int nn = 0;
00679                                 node_array<int> INDEX( listOfGraphs[ i ], 0 );
00680                                 forall_nodes( n, listOfGraphs[ i ]){
00681                                         ncount = 0;
00682                                         INDEX[ n ] = nn;
00683                                         STRINGS temp_S;
00684                                         strcpy( temp_S.name, GenesNode[ listOfGraphs[ i ][ n ] ].GENE);
00685                                         nameGraph.append( temp_S  );
00686                                         nn++;   
00687                                 }
00688                                 /*forall_items( it, nameGraph )
00689                                         printf( "%s\n", (char*)nameGraph[ it ].name );*/
00690                                 namesForEachGraph.append(nameGraph);
00691 
00692                                 sprintf( filename , "sources/graph_sources/Relation%d.txt" , i+1 );
00693                                 wptr2 = fopen( filename, "w" );
00694                                 forall_edges( e, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00695                                         node source = listOfGraphs[ i ].source( e );
00696                                         node target = listOfGraphs[ i ].target( e );
00697                                         fprintf( wptr2, "%s\t=>\t%s\t|\t|\n", nameS[ INDEX[ source ] ], nameS[ INDEX[target] ] );
00698                                 }
00699 
00700                                 fclose( wptr2 );
00701 
00702 
00703                                 leda::string m = "";
00704                                 listOfGraphs[ i ].write( GRAPHS );
00705                                 GRAPHS.close();
00706 
00707                                 /************************************************/
00708                                 /*    Copy Graph as leda::string type Graph     */
00709                                 /************************************************/
00710                               GRAPH<leda::string,int> HAsString;                
00711                               HAsString.clear();
00712                               leda::string temp;
00713                               int count = 0;
00714                               forall_nodes( n, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00715                                       zzz = HAsString.new_node();
00716                                       for( ; count < 16; count++ );
00717                                               temp.insert( count, nameS[ INDEX[ n ] ][ count ] );
00718                                       HAsString[ zzz ] = temp;
00719                               }
00720                               node_array<int> INDEX_S( HAsString, 0 );
00721                               count = 0;
00722                               forall_nodes( n, HAsString ){
00723                                       INDEX_S[ n ] = count;
00724                                       count++;
00725                               }
00726                               forall_edges( e, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00727                                       int a = INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].source( e ) ];
00728                                       int b = INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].target( e ) ];
00729 
00730                                       forall_nodes( m1, HAsString ){
00731                                               if( INDEX_S[ m1 ] == a )
00732                                                       break;
00733                                       }
00734                                       forall_nodes( m2, HAsString ){
00735                                               if( INDEX_S[ m2 ] == b )
00736                                                       break;
00737                                       }
00738                                       //cout << m1 << " " << a << " - " << m2 << b << endl; 
00739                                       HAsString.new_edge( m1, m2, 1 );
00740                               }
00741 
00742                               node_array<point> pos_S(HAsString);
00743                               edge_array<list<point> > bends_S(HAsString);
00744                               array <list<node> > layer_S( layers.size());
00745                               /*forall_nodes( n1, HAsString ){
00746                                   cout << endl<< INDEX_S[ n1 ];
00747                               }
00748                               forall_nodes( n2, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00749                                   cout << endl<< INDEX[ n2 ];
00750                               }*/
00751                               forall_nodes( n1, HAsString ){
00752                                   forall_nodes( n2, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00753                                       //cout << endl<< INDEX_S[ n1 ] << "  " << INDEX[ n2 ]<<endl;
00754                                       if( INDEX_S[ n1 ] == INDEX[ n2 ] ){
00755                                           //cout << endl << pos_S[ n1 ] << "  " << pos[ n2 ] << endl;        
00756                                           pos_S[ n1 ] = pos[ n2 ];
00757                                       }
00758                                   }
00759                               }
00760                               forall_edges( e1, HAsString ){
00761                                   forall_edges( e2, listOfGraphs[ i ] ){
00762                                       if( INDEX_S[ HAsString.source( e1 ) ] == INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].source( e2 ) ] &&
00763                                             INDEX_S[ HAsString.target( e1 ) ] == INDEX[ listOfGraphs[ i ].target( e2 )  ] )
00764                                             bends_S[ e1 ] = bends[ e2 ];
00765                                   }
00766                               }
00767                               int j;
00768                               for( j = 0; j < layers.size(); j++ ){
00769                                   list<node> layerTemp = layers[ j ];
00770                                   forall_items( it, layerTemp ){
00771                                       forall_nodes( n1, HAsString ){
00772                                           if( INDEX_S[ n1 ] == INDEX[ layerTemp[ it ] ] ){
00773                                             layer_S[ j ].push_back( n1 );
00774                                           }
00775                                       }
00776                                   }
00777                               }
00778                               for( j = 0; j < layer_S.size(); j++ ){
00779                                   list<node> layerTemp = layer_S[ j ];
00780 //                                forall_items( it, layerTemp ){
00781 //                                      cout << INDEX_S[ layerTemp[ it ] ] << " ";
00782 //                                }
00783                               }
00784                               cout << endl;
00785                               for( j = 0; j < layers.size(); j++ ){
00786                                   list<node> layerTemp = layers[ j ];
00787 //                                forall_items( it, layerTemp ){
00788 //                                      cout << INDEX[ layerTemp[ it ] ] << " ";
00789 //                                }
00790                               }
00791 
00792 
00793                               POS.push_back( pos_S );
00794                               BENDS.push_back( bends_S );
00795                               LAYERS.push_back( layer_S );
00796                               GraphList_S.append( HAsString );
00797                               //cout << " Size 1 : " << HAsString.number_of_nodes() << " Size 2 : " << listOfGraphs[ i ].number_of_nodes() << " Size 3 : " << nameGraph.size() << endl;
00798                               HAsString.clear();
00799                 }
00800                             /************************************************/
00801                             /* End of Copy Graph as leda::string type Graph */
00802                             /************************************************/                  
00803         }
00804         fclose( wptr3 );
00805 }
00806 
00833 GRAPH<int,int> mainGraphHandling( GRAPH<leda::string,int> &PROJECT,
00834                                   node_array<int> &nodesOfProjectStr,
00835                                   array<node> &nodesOfProjectInt,
00836                                   list<GRAPH<int,int> > &GraphList,
00837                                   list<GRAPH<leda::string,int> > &GraphList_S, 
00838                                   list<list<Strings> > &namesForEachGraph,
00839                                   array<GENENAMES> &GenesNode,
00840                                   node_array<double> &HValues,
00841                                   list<double> &H_values,
00842                                   node_array<double> &Xpos,
00843                                   node_array<double> &Ypos,             
00844                                   node_array<point> &pos,
00845                                   edge_array<list<point> > &bends,
00846                                   edge_array<int> &edgeNumbersForStr_,
00847                                   array<edge> &edgeNumbersForInt_,
00848                                   int algorithmFlag,
00849                                   bool brandFlag,
00850                                   bool brandFlag2,
00851                                   bool ourMethodFlag,
00852                                   double space,
00853                                   int increment,
00854                                   bool ledaPostFlag,
00855                                   double nodeSize,
00856                                   double edgeBendImp,
00857                                   double colorScale,
00858                                   double edgThicknessTher,
00859                                   GRAPH<leda::string,int> &G1,
00860                                   GRAPH<leda::string,int> &G2,
00861                                   GRAPH<int,int> &TEMPINT,
00862                                   GRAPH<int,int> &G,
00863                                   int simplify,
00864                                   double removeRat,
00865                                   bool sharedGenes,
00866                                   double Hmax,
00867                                   int max_weight,
00868                                   bool edgesBetween
00869                                 )
00870 {
00871 
00872         node n,n1,n2,projectNode;
00873         edge e,e1,e2;
00874         list_item it,it1,it2,it3;
00875         int count = 0,i;
00876         int counter = 0;
00877         forall_nodes( n, PROJECT ){
00878                 HValues[ n ] = H_values[ H_values.get_item( counter )];
00879                 //cout << counter << " - " << HValues[ n ] << endl;
00880                 counter++;
00881         }
00882 
00883         it2 = namesForEachGraph.first_item();
00884         forall_items( it, GraphList_S){
00885                 //cout << GraphList_S[ it ].number_of_nodes() << " --- " << namesForEachGraph[ it2 ].size() << endl;
00886                 it2 = namesForEachGraph.succ( it2 );
00887         }
00888 
00889         //cout << " Graphlist size " << GraphList_S.size() << endl;
00890 
00891         int count1 = 0, count2 = 0, innerCount = 0, innerCount2 = 0;
00892 
00893         int DEBUG_GIVING_NAMES = 0;
00894         node f1,f2;
00895         list_item it_n1,it_n2;
00896         /*  To iterate over graph list for n^2 loop we need iterators */
00897         list_item graph_item1,graph_item2;
00898         /*  To iterate over graph list for n^2 loop we need two iterators and initialise first one*/
00899         graph_item1 = namesForEachGraph.first_item();
00900         int comparisonNumber = 0;
00901         list<Strings> nameGraph1,nameGraph2;
00902         forall_items( it1, GraphList_S){
00903                 nameGraph1 = namesForEachGraph[ graph_item1 ];
00904                 G1 = GraphList_S[ it1 ];
00905                 it_n1 = nameGraph1.first_item();
00906                 forall_nodes( n, G1 ){
00907                         G1[ n ] = nameGraph1[ it_n1 ].name;
00908                         //cout << G1[ n ] << endl; 
00909                         it_n1 = nameGraph1.succ( it_n1 );
00910                 }
00911                 GraphList_S[ it1 ] = G1;
00912                 graph_item1 = namesForEachGraph.succ( graph_item1 );
00913 
00914         }
00915 
00916 
00917         int countIN = 0;
00918         int countOUT = 0;
00919         if( sharedGenes == true ){
00920                 /********************************************************************/
00921                 /*                                                                  */
00922                 /* If you are doing the first model as it is mentioned in the paper */
00923                 /* The main graph composed with the idea using shared genes among   */
00924                 /*  biclusters                                                      */
00925                 /*                                                                  */
00926                 /********************************************************************/  
00927                 forall_items( it1, GraphList_S){
00928                         G1 = GraphList_S[ it1 ];
00929                         innerCount = 0;
00930                         forall_nodes( f1, PROJECT ){
00931                                 if( innerCount == countOUT )
00932                                         break;
00933                                 innerCount++;
00934                         }
00935                         int flg = 0;
00936                         forall_items( it2, GraphList_S){
00937                                         G2 = GraphList_S[ it2 ];
00938                                         innerCount2 = 0;
00939                                         forall_nodes( f2, PROJECT ){
00940                                                 if( innerCount2 == countIN )
00941                                                         break;
00942                                                 innerCount2++;
00943                                         }
00944                                         /*cout << endl << "--------------------------" << endl << "IN " << countIN << endl << "OUT" << countOUT << endl;
00945                                         forall_nodes( n, G1 ){
00946                                                 cout << G1[ n ] << "  ";
00947                                         }
00948                                         cout << endl;
00949                                         forall_nodes( n, G2 ){
00950                                                 cout << G2[ n ] << "  ";
00951                                         }
00952                                         cout << endl << "--------------------------" << endl;*/
00953                                         
00954                                         node_array<bool> mark( G1, false );
00955                                         node_array<bool> mark2( G2, false );
00956                                         if( it1 != it2 ){
00957                                                 forall_nodes( n1, G1 ){
00958                                                         forall_nodes( n2, G2 ){
00959                                                                 if( strcmp( G1[ n1 ],G2[ n2 ] ) == 0 && mark[ n1 ] == false && mark2[ n2 ] == false ){
00960 
00961                                                                         int flag_e = 0;
00962                                                                         edge e1;
00963                                                                         if( DEBUG_GIVING_NAMES )
00964                                                                                 cout << "\n 5 gecti" << endl;
00965                                                                         edge ee;
00966                                                                         forall_edges( ee, PROJECT ){
00967                                                                                 if( (PROJECT.source( ee ) == f1 && PROJECT.target( ee ) == f2) || (PROJECT.source( ee ) == f2 && PROJECT.target( ee ) == f1)  ){
00968                                                                                         flag_e = 1;
00969                                                                                         e = ee;
00970                                                                                         break;
00971                                                                                 }
00972                                                                         }
00973                                                                         if( flag_e == 0 && f1 != NULL && f2 != NULL ){
00974                                                                                 e = PROJECT.new_edge( f1 ,f2 );
00975                                                                                 PROJECT[ e ] = 1;
00976                                                                         }
00977                                                                         else{
00978                                                                                 if( e != NULL )
00979                                                                                         PROJECT[ e ]++;
00980                                                                         }
00981                                                                 }
00982                                                                 mark2[ n2 ] = true;
00983                                                         }
00984                                                         mark[ n1 ] = true;
00985                                                 }
00986                                         }
00987                                         countIN++;
00988                                         if( countIN == GraphList_S.size() )
00989                                                 break;
00990                         }
00991                         countIN = 0;
00992                         countOUT++;
00993                         if( countOUT == GraphList_S.size() + 1 )
00994                                 break;
00995                 }
00996         }
00997         else{
00998                 if( edgesBetween == true ){
00999                 /********************************************************************/  
01000                 /*                                                                  */
01001                 /* Else the second method that is visualized in the paper           */
01002                 /*                                                                  */
01003                 /********************************************************************/  
01004                         node_array<list<node> > neighbors( TEMPINT );
01005                         forall_nodes( n, TEMPINT ){
01006                                 list<edge> elist = TEMPINT.out_edges( n );
01007                                 forall_items( it, elist ){
01008                                         neighbors[ n ].append( TEMPINT.target( elist[ it ]  ) );
01009                                 }
01010                         }
01011                         forall_items( it1, GraphList_S){
01012                                 G1 = GraphList_S[ it1 ];
01013                                 innerCount = 0;
01014                                 forall_nodes( f1, PROJECT ){
01015                                         if( innerCount == countOUT )
01016                                                 break;
01017                                         innerCount++;
01018                                 }
01019                                 int flg = 0;
01020                                 forall_items( it2, GraphList_S){
01021                                                 G2 = GraphList_S[ it2 ];
01022                                                 innerCount2 = 0;
01023                                                 forall_nodes( f2, PROJECT ){
01024                                                         if( innerCount2 == countIN )
01025                                                                 break;
01026                                                         innerCount2++;
01027                                                 }                       
01028                                                 if( it1 != it2 ){
01029                                                         int edgeCount = 0;
01030                                                         forall_nodes( n1, G1 ){
01031                                                                 forall_nodes( n2, TEMPINT ){
01032                                                                         if( strcmp( GenesNode[ TEMPINT[ n2 ] ].GENE, G1[ n1 ] ) == 0 ){
01033                                                                                 n = n2;
01034                                                                                 break;
01035                                                                         }
01036                                                                 }
01037                                                                 list<node> between = neighbors[ n ]; 
01038                                                                 forall_items( it3, between ){
01039                                                                         forall_nodes( n2, G2 ){
01040                                                                                 if( strcmp( GenesNode[ TEMPINT[ between[ it3 ] ] ].GENE , G2[ n2 ] ) == 0 ){
01041                                                                                         edgeCount++;
01042                                                                                 }
01043                                                                         }
01044                                                                 }
01045                                                         }
01046                                                         e = PROJECT.new_edge( f1 ,f2 );
01047                                                         PROJECT[ e ] = edgeCount;
01048                                                 }       
01049                                                 countIN++;
01050                                                 if( countIN == GraphList_S.size() )
01051                                                         break;
01052                                 }
01053                                 countIN = 0;
01054                                 countOUT++;
01055                                 if( countOUT == GraphList_S.size() + 1 )
01056                                         break;
01057                         }
01058                 }
01059                 else{
01060                         forall_items( it1, GraphList_S){
01061                                 G1 = GraphList_S[ it1 ];
01062                                 innerCount = 0;
01063                                 forall_nodes( f1, PROJECT ){
01064                                         if( innerCount == countOUT )
01065                                                 break;
01066                                         innerCount++;
01067                                 }
01068                                 int flg = 0;
01069                                 forall_items( it2, GraphList_S){
01070                                                 G2 = GraphList_S[ it2 ];
01071                                                 innerCount2 = 0;
01072                                                 forall_nodes( f2, PROJECT ){
01073                                                         if( innerCount2 == countIN )
01074                                                                 break;
01075                                                         innerCount2++;
01076                                                 }                       
01077                                                 if( it1 != it2 ){
01078                                                         int edgeCount = 0;
01079                                                         forall_nodes( n1, G1 ){
01080                                                                 forall_nodes( n2, G2 ){
01081                                                                         if( strcmp( G1[ n1 ],G2[ n2 ] ) == 0 ){
01082                                                                                 edgeCount++;
01083                                                                         }
01084                                                                 }
01085                                                         }
01086                                                         e = PROJECT.new_edge( f1 ,f2 );
01087                                                         PROJECT[ e ] = edgeCount;
01088                                                 }
01089                                                 countIN++;
01090                                                 if( countIN == GraphList_S.size() )
01091                                                         break;
01092                                 }
01093                                 countIN = 0;
01094                                 countOUT++;
01095                                 if( countOUT == GraphList_S.size() + 1 )
01096                                         break;
01097                         }
01098                 }
01099         }
01100         list<int> old_edges;
01101         list<edge> old_edges_e;
01102 //      old_edges_e = Make_Simple( PROJECT );
01103 //      PROJECT.hide_edges( old_edges_e );
01104         //cout << endl << " Comparison Number " << comparisonNumber << endl;
01105         int max = 0;
01106 //      forall_edges( e1, PROJECT ){
01107 //              forall_edges( e2, PROJECT ){
01108 //                      if( e1 != e2 ){
01109 //                              if( PROJECT.source( e1 ) == PROJECT.source( e2 ) && PROJECT.target( e1 ) == PROJECT.target( e2 ) ){
01110 //                                      PROJECT.del_edge( e1 );
01111 //                              }
01112 //                      }
01113 //              }
01114 //      }
01115 
01116         forall_edges( e1, PROJECT ){
01117                 PROJECT[ e1 ] =  ( 1 / ( Hmax / HValues[ PROJECT.source( e ) ] * Hmax / HValues[ PROJECT.target( e ) ] ) * PROJECT[ e1 ] );
01118                 if( PROJECT[ e1 ] > max )
01119                         max = PROJECT[ e1 ];
01120         }
01121         double multiply = 100.0 / max;
01122 
01123         node_array<int> indexsP( PROJECT, 0 );
01124         count1 = 0;
01125         forall_nodes( projectNode, PROJECT ){
01126                 indexsP[ projectNode ] = count1;
01127                 count1++;
01128         }
01129 
01130         forall_edges( e1, PROJECT ){
01131                 //cout << PROJECT[ e1 ] << " - " << " old " << endl;    
01132                 n = PROJECT.source( e1 );
01133                 list<edge> edges_l = G.out_edges( n );
01134                 PROJECT[ e1 ] = PROJECT[ e1 ] * multiply;
01135                 if( PROJECT[ e1 ] < (int)(removeRat * 100.0) /*&& edges_l.size() > 2*/ )
01136                         PROJECT.del_edge( e1 );
01137                 else{
01138                         old_edges.append( PROJECT[ e1 ] );                      
01139                         //cout << PROJECT[ e1 ] << " - " << " new " << endl;
01140                 }
01141         }
01142 
01143         list<node> hided;
01144         if( simplify == 1 ){
01145                 forall_nodes( n, PROJECT ){
01146                         if( HValues[ n ] < 0.20 && PROJECT.outdeg(n) == 0 && PROJECT.indeg(n) == 0 )
01147                                 PROJECT.del_node( n );
01148                                 //hided.append( n );//PROJECT.del_node( n );
01149                 }
01150         }
01151 
01152         nodesOfProjectStr.init( PROJECT );
01153 
01154         GRAPH<int,int> PROJECT2;
01155 
01156         /********************************************************************/
01157         /*                                                                  */
01158         /*      Make some filtrations                                       */
01159         /*                                                                  */
01160         /********************************************************************/
01161         count = 0;
01162         array<node> Nodes( PROJECT.number_of_nodes() + 1);
01163         forall_nodes( n1, PROJECT ){
01164                 n2 = PROJECT2.new_node();
01165                 Nodes[ count ] = n1;
01166                 nodesOfProjectStr[ n1 ] = count;
01167                 nodesOfProjectInt[ count ] = n2;
01168                 count++;
01169         }       
01170         node_array<double> HValues2( PROJECT2 );
01171         count = 0;
01172         forall_nodes( n1, PROJECT2 ){
01173                 HValues2[ n1 ] = HValues[ Nodes[ count ] ];
01174                 count++;
01175         }
01176         count = 0;
01177         edge_array<int> edgeNumbersForStr( PROJECT );
01178         array<edge> edgeNumbersForInt( PROJECT2.number_of_edges() );
01179         forall_edges( e1, PROJECT ){
01180                 e2 = PROJECT2.new_edge( nodesOfProjectInt[ nodesOfProjectStr[ PROJECT.source( e1 ) ] ], nodesOfProjectInt[ nodesOfProjectStr[ PROJECT.target( e1 ) ] ] );
01181                 PROJECT2[ e2 ]= PROJECT[ e1 ];
01182                 edgeNumbersForStr[ e1 ] = count;
01183                 edgeNumbersForInt.resize( PROJECT2.number_of_edges() );
01184                 edgeNumbersForInt[ count ] = e2;
01185                 count++;
01186         }
01187 
01188         /********************************************************************/
01189         /*                                                                  */
01190         /*      Run our weighted layering method                            */
01191         /*      Settings are imported from main menu                        */
01192         /*                                                                  */
01193         /********************************************************************/
01194         Xpos.init( PROJECT2 );
01195         Ypos.init( PROJECT2 );
01196         pos.init( PROJECT2 );
01197         bends.init( PROJECT2 );
01198         edgeNumbersForStr_ = edgeNumbersForStr;
01199         edgeNumbersForInt_ = edgeNumbersForInt;
01200         RUN_SELF2( PROJECT2, max_weight, 10, Xpos, Ypos, i + 1, pos, bends, HValues2, hided, algorithmFlag, brandFlag, brandFlag2, ourMethodFlag, space, increment,ledaPostFlag,nodeSize,edgeBendImp,colorScale,edgThicknessTher );     
01201         edge_array<list<leda::segment> > segmentLists( PROJECT2 );
01202 
01203         return PROJECT2;
01204 }
